video_title: Do You have Trust Issues? 【Psych2Go Story Series】
transcript:
how can I paint with these colors when
my world feels so
gray I wish I could trust like that
again trust is like
painting it's a
journey
see trust isn't always permanent but
every moment every stroke every color
can lead to a beautiful
masterpiece
but how do I know I won't get hurt
again you
don't but avoiding trust also means
avoiding the brightest colors of
life it felt like a
stab how do I move past
that by remembering that one person's
actions don't Define everyone for every
dark shade there's a bright one one
waiting when I was betrayed I found
strength and
forgiveness I found solace and
self-love I realized that trust in
myself was the first step to trusting
others I still can't find the right
color for
trust that's because trust isn't just
one color it's a mix of experiences
emotions and moments
I've been hurt too but together maybe we
can find the brighter
Shades I realize trust is an Ever
evolving
art sometimes it's
messy sometimes it's clear but it always
has the potential to be
beautiful your masterpiece is just
beginning are you looking for a cuddly
companion that brings positivity and
mental Wellness to your daily life get
your very own sigh The Lovable plushy is
here to brighten your days it embodies
the spirit of Psych too and it serves as
a reminder to prioritize your mental
well-being its Green Leaf symbolizes
growth renewal and the importance of
self-care whether it's for yourself or
as a thoughtful gift for a loved one Sai
is ready to be your snuggly friend
through all of life's ups and downs by
your side pleas you today link is listed
in the description box
